overview: Complete UI redesign of Voxa to match the new minimalist editorial aesthetic. Features warm Alabaster (#F9F8F6) light mode, deep Charcoal (#121212) dark mode, muted Terracotta (#D97058) accent, Playfair Display headings, and Manrope body text. The home dashboard shows time-based greeting, recent transcriptions, daily insights, and quick tools.
goals: Create Recent Transcriptions list with icons and metadata
Add Daily Insights sidebar (words spoken, time saved)
Add Quick Tools section (AI Text Cleanup, Import Audio)
Update sidebar navigation styling to match new design
Ensure proper light/dark mode support throughout
successMetrics: Light and dark modes both look polished
uiNotes: Light mode: Warm Alabaster background (#F9F8F6), white surfaces
Dark mode: Deep Charcoal (#121212), darker sidebar (#0A0A0A), surfaces (#1E1E1E)
Typography: Playfair Display (italic for headings), Manrope (body)
Sidebar: Icon + label navigation, terracotta highlight for active item
Dashboard: Editorial layout with generous whitespace
Recent Transcriptions: List with circular icon badges, title, subtitle, timestamp
Daily Insights: Large numbers with labels (Words Spoken, Time Saved)
Quick Tools: Bordered buttons with icons
rules: Use Color.Voxa design tokens (already updated in DesignSystem.swift)
Playfair Display for display/heading text (italic style)

stories.title: Home Dashboard Header with Time-Based Greeting
stories.description: As a user, I want to see a personalized time-based greeting when I open the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Display 'Good morning.' before 12pm, 'Good afternoon.' 12pm-5pm, 'Good evening.' after 5pm
Use Playfair Display font (large, ~48-60pt)
Add subtitle: 'Ready to capture your thoughts? Your last session was X ago.'
Subtitle uses Manrope font, muted color
Add 'DASHBOARD' label in header (uppercase, tracking-widest, small)
Add date and 'System Active' status indicator in top-right
Example: User opens app at 3pm -> sees 'Good afternoon.'
Negative case: No previous session -> show 'Ready to capture your thoughts?'

stories.title: Start Recording Button
stories.description: As a user, I want a prominent Start Recording button in the dashboard header.
acceptanceCriteria: Pill-shaped button with terracotta (#D97058) background
White text: 'Start Recording'
Microphone icon on left (pulsing animation)
Keyboard shortcut badge on right (e.g., '⌘ R')
Subtle shadow (shadow-primary/20)
Hover state: slight lift (-translate-y-1)
Button triggers recording when clicked
Example: User clicks button -> recording starts
Negative case: Recording already active -> button shows 'Stop Recording'

stories.title: Recent Transcriptions List
stories.description: As a user, I want to see my recent transcriptions in the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Section header: 'Recent Transcriptions' in Playfair Display italic
'View All' link on right side of header
List shows last 3-5 transcriptions
Each item has: circular icon badge, title, subtitle (cleanup mode + duration), timestamp
Icon types: description (document), lightbulb (idea), mail (email), etc.
Hover state: subtle background highlight, title turns terracotta
Items separated by subtle border line
Click item -> navigates to History with that item selected
Example: 'Meeting Notes: Q4 Review' / 'Automated cleanup enabled • 24 mins' / '10:42 AM Today'
Negative case: No transcriptions -> show 'No transcriptions yet. Start recording to begin.'

stories.title: Daily Insights Sidebar
stories.description: As a user, I want to see daily statistics about my voice usage.
acceptanceCriteria: Section header: 'Daily Insights' in Playfair Display italic
Words Spoken: Large number (e.g., '1,240') with percentage change indicator
Percentage change: green arrow up for increase, red for decrease
Time Saved: Large number (e.g., '45m') with 'vs typing' label
Divider line between stats
Stats calculated from UsageStatsManager
Example: User transcribed 1,240 words -> shows '1,240' with '↑ 12%'
Negative case: No data -> show '0' with 'Start recording to track'

stories.title: Quick Tools Section
stories.description: As a user, I want quick access to common tools from the dashboard.
acceptanceCriteria: Section header: 'Quick Tools' in Playfair Display italic
Two tool buttons: 'AI Text Cleanup' and 'Import Audio File'
Buttons have border, icon on right side
Hover state: border turns terracotta, icon turns terracotta
AI Text Cleanup: Opens text cleanup functionality
Import Audio File: Opens file picker for audio import
Example: User clicks 'AI Text Cleanup' -> cleanup panel opens
Negative case: Feature not available -> button disabled with tooltip

stories.title: Sidebar Navigation Redesign
stories.description: As a user, I want the sidebar to match the new minimalist design.
acceptanceCriteria: Sidebar background: white/50 in light mode, #0A0A0A in dark mode
Voxa logo and name in header
Navigation items: Home, History, Snippets, Dictionary, Settings
Icons: home, schedule, folder_copy, book, settings (Material Icons style)
Active item: terracotta text and background (primary/10)
Inactive items: muted gray (#888888), hover shows subtle highlight
Collapse button at bottom with 'Collapse' label
Collapsed state shows only icons
Border on right side of sidebar
Example: User on Home -> Home item has terracotta highlight
Negative case: Window too narrow -> sidebar auto-collapses

stories.title: Dashboard Layout Grid
stories.description: As a user, I want the dashboard content arranged in a clean grid layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Main content area with generous padding (px-10 lg:px-16)
Header section with greeting and Start Recording button
Horizontal divider line below header
Two-column grid below divider: 8 cols for transcriptions, 4 cols for insights
Right column has left border separating it from main content
Daily Insights and Quick Tools stacked vertically in right column
Responsive: single column on smaller windows
Max width constraint (max-w-7xl) centered
Example: Wide window -> two-column layout
Negative case: Narrow window -> single column, insights below transcriptions

stories.title: Typography System Update
stories.description: As a developer, I want consistent typography using Playfair Display and Manrope.
acceptanceCriteria: Add Font.Voxa.display for Playfair Display headings
Add Font.Voxa.displayItalic for italic headings (section titles)
Update Font.Voxa.body to use Manrope
Display font sizes: 48-60pt for main greeting, 24pt for section titles
Body font sizes: 14-16pt for content, 12pt for captions
Fallback to system fonts if custom fonts unavailable
Example: Section title 'Recent Transcriptions' uses displayItalic
Negative case: Font not loaded -> falls back to system serif/sans
